reporter_caption.center: STATE IN INTEREST OF BOLDS, 250 La. 748 (1967)

caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA IN THE INTEREST OF THE MINOR EARL H. BOLDS.

opinion.posture: In re: Earl Howard Bolds applying for writ of review, certiorari, prohibition or rule nisi.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ refused. This case is appealable to the Court of Appeal. Article 7, Section 29, Louisiana Constitution. See also State in Interest of Cook, La.App., 145 So.2d 627. Hence, application must be made first to the Court of Appeal before invoking the supervisory jurisdiction of this Court.
